article.title: Wolfenbarger To Assume Air Force Acquisition Slot
article.author: Henry Kenyon

tags.tag: Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Air Force for Acquisition

article.text: Maj. Gen. Janet C. Wolfenbarger, USAF, has been nominated for appointment to the rank of lieutenant general and assignment as military deputy, Office of the Assistant Secretary of the Air Force for Acquisition, Pentagon, Washington, D.C.
